title: Charlotte's Web
short_plot_summary: A young girl named Fern befriends a pig named Wilbur and a barn spider named Charlotte. Charlotte uses her web-making skills to help save Wilbur from becoming dinner.
explanation: A spider, representing Charlotte, the main character and Wilbur's friend
A spiderweb, symbolizing Charlotte's unique way of communicating to help Wilbur
A pig, representing Wilbur, the other main character and friend of Charlotte
A tractor, for the farm setting where the story takes place
A corn, indicating the agricultural environment of the story and the food grown on the farm
